channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 08:29 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 08:29 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:27 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter!

item.title: 🟢 08:11 The threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.
item.description: 🟢 08:11 The threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated.
